name: Let's Get To The Bottom of That

episodes.title: Colonia Dignidad | A Nazi Colony in Chile
episodes.description: Hidden deep in the Chilean countryside, Colonia Dignidad appeared to be a peaceful German settlement—but behind its gates lay decades of horror. In this episode, we uncover the chilling truth about a secretive cult founded by Nazi fugitive Paul Schäfer. From mind control and torture to its ties with Pinochet’s brutal regime, Colonia Dignidad operated with impunity for years. We’ll explore how this so-called "colony of dignity" became a hub for abuse, human experimentation, and government-sanctioned terror. Join us as we pull back the curtain on one of South America's darkest conspiracies.
